title: To Combat Malware Tool, U.S. Undertakes Massive Cyber Crackdown
teaser: U.S. officials announced they've arrested over 90 people in 19 countries for using and distributing a malware tool that makes cybercrime simple. Brian Krebs of the website Krebs on Security explains.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
